summary: This is an email notification from an Associate Warden at FCI Estill confirming that Jeffrey Epstein was not granted bail and returned from court without incident on July 18, 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email; an inmate at FCI Estill who was not granted bail and returned from court without incident.

persons.name: R. Kelly
persons.context: Mentioned in the initial comment as a point of comparison for not being surprised about Epstein's bail denial.

events.title: Epstein bail denial
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was not granted bail and returned from court without incident.

locations.name: FCI Estill
locations.context: Federal Correctional Institution where Jeffrey Epstein was held.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was denied bail on July 18, 2019.
Epstein returned from court to FCI Estill without incident after the bail hearing.
The document is an official notification from the Associate Warden of Operations at FCI Estill.
The sender references R. Kelly's similar bail situation as context for not being surprised by Epstein's outcome.
